item.title: Book Club Announcement: Eloquent Ruby by Russ Olsen
item.dc:creator: Charles Max Wood
item.description: Our next book club episode will be on December 6. We will be reading Eloquent RubyÂ by Russ Olsen. Of course, we’ll be inviting the author. The book has been recommended by several panelists and we’re excited for what it holds in store. Start reading and join us in December!
